variable.name: FR104
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4) ASK FOR REASON(S) -PULLING OR PUSHING LARGE OBJECTS LIKE A LIVING ROOM CHAIR

variable.name: FR105
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4) ASK FOR REASON(S) -EITHER STOOPING, CROUCHING, OR KNEELING

variable.name: FR106
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -REACHING OR EXTENDING ARMS BELOW SHOULDER LEVEL

variable.name: FR107
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -REACHING OR EXTENDING ARMS ABOVE SHOULDER LEVEL

variable.name: FR108
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -EITHER WRITING, HANDLING, OR FINGERING SMALL OBJECTS

variable.name: FR109
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -STANDING IN ONE PLACE FOR LONG PERIODS, SAY 15 MINUTES

variable.name: FR110
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -SITTING FOR LONG PERIODS, SAY 1 HOUR

variable.name: FR111
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -LIFTING OR CARRYING WEIGHTS UNDER 10 POUNDS (LIKE A BAG OF POTATOES)

variable.name: FR112
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -LIFTING OR CARRYING WEIGHTS OVER 10 POUNDS (LIKE A VERY HEAVY BAG OF GROCERIES)

variable.name: FR113
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -GETTING IN AND OUT OF CAR

variable.name: FR114
variable.description: NAGI QUESTIONS - FOR EACH ACTIVITY THAT SUBJECT HAD A LOT OF DIFFICULTY DOING OR WAS UNABLE TO DO (CODES 3 OR 4), ASK FOR REASON(S) -PUTTING ON SOCKS OR STOCKINGS

variable.name: FR116
variable.description: IN THE PAST YEAR HAVE YOU ACCIDENTALLY FALLEN AND HIT THE FLOOR OR GROUND? (NOTE: CODE AS NO IF DURING SPORTS ACTIVITY)

variable.name: FR117
variable.description: (IF YES OR MAYBE TO FR116) HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU FALL IN THE PAST YEAR?

variable.name: FR118
variable.description: FRACTURES - SINCE YOUR LAST CLINIC VISIT HAVE YOU BROKEN ANY BONES?

variable.name: FR140
variable.description: CES-D - PLEASE SAY IF YOU FELT THAT WAY DURING THE PAST WEEK: I WAS BOTHERED BY THINGS THAT USUALLY DON'T BOTHER ME.
variable.value: RARELY OR NONE OF THE TIME (LESS THAN ONE DAY)
SOME OR A LITTLE OF THE TIME (1-2 DAYS)
OCCASIONALLY OR MODERATE AMOUNT OF TIME (3-4 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.name: FR160
variable.description: BERKMAN - THE FOLLOWING TWO PAGE QUESTIONAIRE ASKS ABOUT YOUR SOCIAL SUPPORT. PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS AND CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION. HOW MANY CLOSE FRIENDS DO YOU HAVE; PEOPLE THAT YOU FEEL AT EASE WITH, CAN TALK TO ABOUT PRIVATE MATTERS?

variable.name: FR161
variable.description: BERKMAN - HOW MANY OF THESE CLOSE FRIENDS DO YOU SEE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR162
variable.description: BERKMAN - HOW MANY RELATIVES DO YOU HAVE; PEOPLE YOU FEEL AT EASE WITH, CAN TALK TO ABOUT PRIVATE MATTERS? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR163
variable.description: BERKMAN - HOW MANY OF THESE RELATIVES DO YOU SEE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR164
variable.description: BERKMAN - DO YOU PARTICIPATE IN ANY GROUPS SUCH AS A SENIOR CENTER, SOCIAL OR WORK GROUP, CHURCH CONNECTED GROUP, SELF-HELP GROUP, OR CHARITY, PUBLIC SERVICE OR COMMUNITY GROUP? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR165
variable.description: BERKMAN - ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO RELIGIOUS MEETINGS OR SERVICES? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR166
variable.description: BERKMAN - DO YOU HAVE MEDICARE OR MEDICAID? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR167
variable.description: BERKMAN - DO YOU HAVE HEALTH INSURANCE? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR168
variable.description: BERKMAN - IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO YOU WHOM YOU CAN COUNT ON TO LISTEN TO YOU WHEN YOU NEED TO TALK? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR169
variable.description: BERKMAN - IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO GIVE YOU GOOD ADVICE ABOUT A PROBLEM? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR170
variable.description: BERKMAN - IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO YOU WHO SHOWS YOU LOVE AND AFFECTION? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR171
variable.description: BERKMAN - CAN YOU COUNT ON ANYONE TO PROVE YOU WITH EMOTIONAL SUPPORT (TALKING OVER PROBLEMS OR HELPING YOU MAKE A DIFFICULT DECISION)? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.

variable.name: FR172
variable.description: BERKMAN - DO YOU HAVE AS MUCH CONTACT AS WOULD LIKE WITH SOMEONE YOU FEEL CLOSE TO, SOMEONE IN WHOM YOU CAN TRUST AND CONFIDE? PLEASE CIRCLE THE RESPONSE THAT MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES YOUR CURRENT SITUATION.
